anya-e0803n1:1_0: Tattha dhātūti kenaṭṭhena dhātu? Sakatthampi dhāretīti dhātu, atthātisayayogato paratthampi
anya-e0803n1:1_1: dhāretīti dhātu, vīsatiyā upasaggesu yena kenaci upasaggena atthavisesakāraṇena paṭibaddhā
anya-e0803n1:1_2: atthavisesampi dhāretīti dhātu, ‘‘ayaṁ imissā attho, ayamito paccayo paro’’tiādinā
anya-e0803n1:1_3: anekappakārena paṇḍitehi dhāriyati esātipi dhātu, vidahanti viduno etāya saddanipphattiṁ
anya-e0803n1:1_4: ayalohādimayaṁ ayalohādidhātūhi viyātipi dhātu. Evaṁ tāva dhātusaddassattho veditabbo.
anya-e0803n1:4_0: Atha vā jinamate ‘‘tato gotamidhātūnī’’ti ettha dhātusaddo liṅgavipallāse vattati
anya-e0803n1:4_1: ‘‘pabbatāni vanāni cā’’ti ettha pabbatasaddo viya, na panettha vattabbaṁ ‘‘aṭṭhivācakattā
anya-e0803n1:4_3: saddā dhātavo. Seyyathidaṁ? Bhū i ku ke takka taka taki sukaiccādayo. Gaṇato te aṭṭhavidhā
anya-e0803n1:4_4: bhūvādigaṇo rudhādigaṇo divādigaṇo svādigaṇo kiyādigaṇo gahādigaṇo tanādigaṇo curādigaṇo
anya-e0803n1:4_5: cāti. Idāni tesaṁ vikaraṇasaññite paccaye dassessāma. Anekavidhā hi paccayā nānappakāresu
anya-e0803n1:4_6: nāmanāma kitanāma samāsanāma taddhitanāmākhyātesu pavattanato. Saṅkhepato pana duvidhāva
anya-e0803n1:4_7: nāmapaccayo ākhyātapaccayo cāti. Tatrāpi ākhyātapaccayā duvidhā vikaraṇapaccayanovikaraṇapaccayavasena.
anya-e0803n1:4_8: Tattha vikaraṇapaccayo akārādisattarasavidho aggahitaggahaṇena pannarasavidho ca.
anya-e0803n1:4_9: Novikaraṇapaccayo pana kha cha sādinekavidho. Ye rūpanipphattiyā upakārakā atthavisesassa
anya-e0803n1:4_10: jotakā vā ajotakā vā lopanīyā vā alopanīyā vā, te saddā paccayā.
anya-e0803n1:5: Paṭicca kāraṇaṁ taṁ taṁ, entīti paccayātha vā;
anya-e0803n1:8: Nāmakappe yato tasmā, na taṁ vitthārayāmase.
anya-e0803n1:11_0: Iccānekavidhesu paccayesu ‘‘vikaraṇapaccayā nāma ime’’ti sallakkhetabbā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n1:11_1: Bhūvādigaṇato apaccayo hoti kattari, rudhādigaṇato akārivaṇṇekārokārapaccayā honti
anya-e0803n1:11_2: kattari, pubbamajjhaṭṭhāne niggahītāgamo ca, divādigaṇato yapaccayo hoti kattari,
anya-e0803n1:11_3: svādigaṇato ṇu ṇā uṇāpaccayā honti kattari, kiyādigaṇato nāpaccayo hoti kattari,
anya-e0803n1:11_4: gahādigaṇato ppa ṇhāpaccayā honti kattari, tanādigaṇato o yirapaccayā honti kattari,
anya-e0803n1:12: Akāro ca ivaṇṇo ca, e okārā ca yo tathā;
anya-e0803n1:13: Ṇu ṇā uṇā ca nā ppa ṇhā-yirā ṇe ṇayapaccayā.
anya-e0803n1:16_0: Ye evaṁ niddiṭṭhehi vikaraṇapaccayehi tadaññehi ca sappaccayā aṭṭhavidhā dhātugaṇā
anya-e0803n1:16_1: suttantesu bahūpakārā, tesvāyaṁ bhūvādigaṇo. Bhū sattāyaṁ, bhūdhātu vijjamānatāyaṁ
anya-e0803n1:16_2: vattati. Sakammikākammikāsu dhātūsu ayaṁ akammikā dhātu, na pana ‘‘dhammabhūto’’tiādīsu
anya-e0803n1:16_3: pattiatthavācikā aparā bhūdhātu viya sakammikā. Esā hi pariabhiādīhi upasaggehi yuttāyeva
anya-e0803n1:16_4: sakammikā bhavati, na upa parā pātuādīhi upasagganipātehi yuttāpi. Ato imissā siddhāni
anya-e0803n1:16_5: rūpāni dvidhā ñeyyāni akammakapadāni sakammakapadāni cāti.
anya-e0803n1:18_0: Tatra bhavati ubbhavati samubbhavati pabhavati parābhavati sambhavati vibhavati,
anya-e0803n1:18_1: bhoti sambhoti vibhoti pātubhavati pātubbhavati pātubhoti, imāni akammakapadāni.
anya-e0803n1:18_2: Ettha pātuiti nipāto, so ‘‘āvibhavati tirobhavatī’’tiādīsu āvi tironipātā viya bhūdhātuto
anya-e0803n1:18_3: nipphannākhyātasaddassa neva visesakaro, na ca sakammakattasādhako. Uiccādayo upasaggā,
anya-e0803n1:18_4: te pana visesakarā, na sakammakattasādhakā. Yesamattho kammena sambandhanīyo na hoti,
anya-e0803n1:18_5: tāni padāni akammakāni. Akammakapadānaṁ yathārahaṁ sakammakākammakavasena attho kathetabbo.
anya-e0803n1:18_6: Paribhoti paribhavati, abhibhoti abhibhavati, adhibhoti adhibhavati, atibhoti atibhavati,
anya-e0803n1:18_7: anubhoti anubhavati, samanubhoti samanubhavati, abhisambhoti abhisambhavati, imāni
anya-e0803n1:18_8: sakammakapadāni. Ettha pariiccādayo upasaggā, te bhūdhātuto nipphannākhyātasaddassa
anya-e0803n1:18_9: visesakarā ceva sakammakattasādhakā ca. Yesamattho kammena sambandhanīyo, tāni padāni
anya-e0803n1:18_10: sakammakāni. Sakammakapadānaṁ sakammakavasena attho kathetabbo, kvaci akammakavasenapi.
anya-e0803n1:19_0: Tatra bhavatīti hoti vijjati paññāyati sarūpaṁ labhati. Ubbhavatīti uppajjati sarūpaṁ
anya-e0803n1:19_1: labhati. Samubbhavatīti samuppajjati sarūpaṁ labhati. Pabhavatīti hoti sambhavati.
anya-e0803n1:19_2: Atha vā pabhavatīti yato kutoci sandati, na vicchijjati, avicchinnaṁ hoti, taṁ taṁ
anya-e0803n1:19_3: ṭhānaṁ visarati. Parābhavatīti parābhavo hoti byasanaṁ āpajjati avuddhiṁ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0803n1:19_4: Sambhavatīti suṭṭhu bhavati vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjati. Vibhavatīti ucchijjati
anya-e0803n1:19_5: vinassati vipajjati, visesato vā bhavati sampajjati. Bhoti sambhoti vibhotīti imāni
anya-e0803n1:19_6: ‘‘bhavati sambhavati vibhavatī’’ti imehi yathākkamaṁ samānaniddesāni. Pātubhavatīti
anya-e0803n1:19_7: pakāsati dissati paññāyati pākaṭaṁ hoti. Pātubbhavati pātubhotīti imāni ‘‘pātubhavatī’’ti
anya-e0803n1:19_8: iminā samānaniddesāni. Evaṁ akammakapadānaṁ yathārahaṁ sakammakākammakavasena atthakathanaṁ
anya-e0803n1:20_0: Paribhotidukādīsu pana sattasu dukesu yathākkamaṁ dve dve padāni samānatthāni, tasmā
anya-e0803n1:20_1: dve dve padāniyeva gahetvā niddisissāma. Tatra paribhoti paribhavatīti paraṁ hiṁsati
anya-e0803n1:20_2: pīḷeti, atha vā hīḷeti avajānāti. Abhibhoti abhibhavatīti paraṁ ajjhottharati maddati.
anya-e0803n1:20_3: Adhibhoti adhibhavatīti paraṁ abhimadditvā bhavati attano vasaṁ vattāpeti. Atibhoti
anya-e0803n1:20_4: atibhavatīti paraṁ atikkamitvā bhavati. Anubhoti anubhavatīti sukhadukkhaṁ vedeti
anya-e0803n1:20_5: paribhuñjati sukhadukkhapaṭisaṁvedī hoti. Samanubhoti samanubhavatīti sukhadukkhaṁ
anya-e0803n1:20_6: suṭṭhu vedeti suṭṭhu paribhuñjati suṭṭhu sukhadukkhapaṭisaṁvedī hoti. Abhisambhoti
anya-e0803n1:20_7: abhisambhavatīti paraṁ ajjhottharati maddati. Evaṁ sakammakapadānaṁ sakammakavasena
anya-e0803n1:20_8: atthakathanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Katthaci pana gacchatīti pavattatīti evaṁ akammakavasenapi.
anya-e0803n1:25_0: Bhāveti vibhāvetisambhāveti paribhāveti, evaṁ hetukattukriyāpadāni bhavanti. Ekakammakavasenesamattho
anya-e0803n1:25_1: gahetabbo . Pacchimassa pana dvikammakavasenapi. Paribhāvāpeti abhibhāvāpeti anubhāvāpeti,
anya-e0803n1:25_2: evampi hetukattukriyāpadāni bhavanti. Dvikammakavasenesamattho gahetabbo. Iccevaṁ
anya-e0803n1:26_0: Tatra bhāvetīti puggalo bhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci bhāveti āsevati bahulīkaroti, atha
anya-e0803n1:26_1: vā bhāvetīti vaḍḍheti. Vibhāvetīti bhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci vibhāveti visesena bhāveti,
anya-e0803n1:26_2: vividhena vā ākārena bhāveti bhāvayati vaḍḍheti, atha vā vibhāvetīti abhāveti antaradhāpeti.
anya-e0803n1:26_3: Sambhāvetīti yassa kassaci guṇaṁ sambhāveti sambhāvayati suṭṭhu pakāseti ukkaṁseti.
anya-e0803n1:26_4: Paribhāvetīti paribhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci paribhāveti paribhāvayati samantato vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0803n1:26_5: Evaṁ ekakammakavasenattho gahetabbo. Atha vā paribhāvetīti vāsetabbaṁ vatthuṁ paribhāveti
anya-e0803n1:26_6: paribhāvayati vāseti gandhaṁ gāhāpeti. Evaṁ dvikammakavasenāpi attho gahetabbo. Paribhāvāpetīti
anya-e0803n1:26_7: puggalo puggalena sapattaṁ paribhāvāpeti hiṁsāpeti, atha vā paribhāvāpetīti hīḷāpeti
anya-e0803n1:26_8: avajānāpeti. Abhibhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sapattaṁ abhibhāvāpeti ajjhottharāpeti.
anya-e0803n1:26_9: Anubhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sampattiṁ anubhāvāpeti paribhojeti.
anya-e0803n1:28: Kriyaṁ sādheti etassa, dīpakaṁ sāsane padaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:34_0: Tatridaṁ karaṇavacanaṁ kammatthadīpakaṁ, upayogasāmivacanānipi taddīpakāni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n1:34_1: Kathaṁ? Paribhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalaṁ sapattaṁ paribhāvāpetīti, tathā paribhāvāpetīti
anya-e0803n1:34_2: puggalo puggalassa sapattaṁ paribhāvāpetīti. Sesāni nayānusārena niddisitabbāni.
anya-e0803n1:34_3: Evaṁ sabbānetāni karaṇopayogasāmivacanāni kammatthadīpakāniyeva honti, tasmā dvikammakavasenattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n1:37_0: Bhaviyate vibhaviyate paribhaviyate abhibhaviyate anubhaviyate paribhūyate abhibhūyate
anya-e0803n1:37_1: anubhūyate, evaṁ kammuno kriyāpadāni bhavanti. Aññathā ca bhaviyyate vibhaviyyate
anya-e0803n1:37_2: paribhaviyyate abhibhaviyyate anubhaviyyate paribhuyyate abhibhuyyate anubhuyyateti.
anya-e0803n1:37_3: Ettha kammuno kriyāpadāniyeva kammakattuno kriyāpadāni katvā yojetabbāni. Visuñhi
anya-e0803n1:38_0: Tatra bhaviyateti bhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci puggalena bhāviyate āseviyate bahulīkariyate,
anya-e0803n1:38_1: atha vā bhaviyateti vaḍḍhiyate. Vibhaviyateti vibhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci puggalena vibhaviyate
anya-e0803n1:38_2: visesena bhaviyate, vividhena vā ākārena bhaviyate vaḍḍhiyate, atha vā vibhaviyateti
anya-e0803n1:38_3: abhaviyate antaradhāpiyate. Paribhaviyateti sapatto puggalena paribhaviyate hiṁsiyate,
anya-e0803n1:38_4: atha vā paribhaviyateti hīḷiyate avajāniyate. Abhibhaviyateti sapatto puggalena abhibhaviyate
anya-e0803n1:38_5: ajjhotthariyate abhimaddiyate. Anubhaviyateti sampatti puggalena anubhaviyate paribhuñjiyate.
anya-e0803n1:38_6: Paribhūyatetiādīni tīṇi ‘‘paribhaviyate’’tiādīhi tīhi samānaniddesāni. Sesāni pana
anya-e0803n1:38_7: yathāvuttehi yaṁ kammameva padhānato gahetvā niddisiyati padaṁ, taṁ kammatthadīpakaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:38_8: Tasmā kattari ekavacanena niddiṭṭhepi yadi kammaṁ bahuvacanavasena vattabbaṁ, bahuvacanantaññeva
anya-e0803n1:38_9: kammuno kriyāpadaṁ dissati. Yadi panekavacanavasena vattabbaṁ, ekavacanantaññeva.
anya-e0803n1:38_10: Tathā kattari bahuvacanena niddiṭṭhepi yadi kammaṁ ekavacanavasena vattabbaṁ, ekavacanantaññeva
anya-e0803n1:38_11: kammuno kriyāpadaṁ dissati. Yadi pana bahuvacanavasena vattabbaṁ, bahuvacanantaññeva.
anya-e0803n1:38_12: Kathaṁ? Bhikkhunā dhammo bhaviyate, bhikkhunā dhammā bhaviyante, bhikkhūhi dhammo
anya-e0803n1:38_13: bhaviyate, bhikkhūhi dhammā bhaviyanteti. Iminā nayena sabbattha kammuno kriyāpadesu
anya-e0803n1:38_14: vohāro kātabbo. Yasmiṁ pana kammuno kriyāpade kammatthadīpake kammabhūtassevatthassa
anya-e0803n1:38_15: kattubhāvaparikappo hoti, taṁ kammakattutthadīpakaṁ, taṁ kammuno kriyāpadato visuṁ
anya-e0803n1:38_16: na labbhati. Ayaṁ panettha atthaviññāpane payogaracanā. Sayameva paribhaviyate dubbhāsitaṁ
anya-e0803n1:38_17: bhaṇaṁ bālo tappaccayā aññehi paribhūtopi, sayameva abhibhaviyate pāpakārī niraye
anya-e0803n1:38_18: nirayapālehi abhibhūtopi tathārūpassa kammassa sayaṁ katattāti. Ettha hi sayameva
anya-e0803n1:38_19: pīyate pānīyaṁ, sayameva kaṭo kariyatetiādīsu viya sukhābhisaṅkharaṇīyatā labbhateva,
anya-e0803n1:41_0: Bhūyate bhaviyate ubbhaviyate, evaṁ bhāvassa kriyāpadāni bhavanti. Aññathā ca bhuyyate
anya-e0803n1:41_1: bhaviyyate ubbhaviyyateti. Tatra yathā ṭhīyatepadassa ṭhānanti bhāvavasena atthakathanamicchanti,
anya-e0803n1:41_2: evaṁ bhūyatetiādīnampi bhavanantiādinā bhāvavasena atthakathanamicchitabbaṁ. Yathā
anya-e0803n1:41_3: ca ṭhānaṁ ṭhiti bhavanantiādīhi bhāvavācakakitantanāmapadehi saddhiṁ sambandhe chaṭṭhiyojanamicchanti,
anya-e0803n1:41_4: na tathā ṭhīyate bhūyatetiādīhi bhāvavācakākhyātapadehi saddhiṁ sambandhe chaṭṭhiyojanā
anya-e0803n1:41_6: Yasmiṁ payoge yaṁ kammuno kriyāpadena samānagatikaṁ katvā vinā kammena niddisiyati
anya-e0803n1:41_7: kriyāpadaṁ, kattuvācakapadaṁ pana paccattavacanena vā karaṇavacanena vā niddisiyati,
anya-e0803n1:41_8: taṁ tattha bhāvatthadīpakaṁ. Na hi sabbathā kattāramanissāya bhāvo pavattati. Evaṁ
anya-e0803n1:41_9: santepi bhāvo nāma kevalo bhavanalavanapacanādiko dhātuatthoyeva. Akkharacintakā
anya-e0803n1:41_11: nāma pabbajitena sunivatthena bhavitabbaṁ supārutena ākappasampannenā’’tiādīsu viya,
anya-e0803n1:41_12: tasmā tesaṁ mate ‘‘tena ubbhaviyate’’ti karaṇavacanena yojetabbaṁ. Jinamatena pana
anya-e0803n1:41_14: niddesapāḷiyaṁ pana dhammasenāpatinā, dhajaggasuttante bhagavatā ca bhāvapadaṁ paccattavacanāpekkhavasenu’ccāritaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:53_0: Tasmā rūpaṁ vibhaviyyati, rūpāni vibhaviyyanti, tvaṁ vibhaviyyasi, tumhe vibhaviyyatha,
anya-e0803n1:53_1: ahaṁ vibhaviyyāmi, mayaṁ vibhaviyyāma, rūpaṁ vibhaviyyate, rūpāni vibhaviyyante iccevamādi
anya-e0803n1:59: Siyā sakammakaṁ, netaṁ, tathā hotīti dīpaye.
anya-e0803n1:61: Vinā yapaccayaṁ tiṭṭhe, na tathā tiṭṭhate idaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:62: Na kattari bhuvādīnaṁ, gaṇe yapaccayo ruto;
anya-e0803n1:64: Na bhūdhātu divādīnaṁ, dhātūnaṁ dissate gaṇe;
anya-e0803n1:72: Sarūpato pakāseti, tasmā te pākaṭā ubho;
anya-e0803n1:78: Yasmā ca kattubhāvena, bhāvo nāma na tiṭṭhati;
anya-e0803n1:80: Yajjevaṁ kattuvohāro, bhāvassa tu kathaṁ siyā;
anya-e0803n1:82: Iti ce nissayānaṁ tu, vasā nissitasambhavā;
anya-e0803n1:90: Pāḷiṁ patvāna tesaṁ tu, vacanaṁ appamāṇakaṁ;
anya-e0803n1:92: Pāṭho pāvacane diṭṭho, tasmā evaṁ vademase;
anya-e0803n1:94: Vacanehi yutaṁ dvīhi, icchitabbanti no ruci;
anya-e0803n1:98_0: Evaṁ suddhakattukriyāpadāni hetukattukriyāpadāni kammuno kriyāpadāni, bhāvassa kriyāpadāni
anya-e0803n1:98_1: cāti catudhā, kammakattukriyāpadehi vā pañcadhā bhūdhātuto nipphannāni kriyāpadāni
anya-e0803n1:98_2: nānappakārena niddiṭṭhāni, etāni lokiyānaṁ bhāvabhedavasena vohārabhedo hotīti dassanatthaṁ
anya-e0803n1:98_3: visuṁ visuṁ vuttāni. Atthato pana kammakattubhāvakārakattayavasena tividhāneva. Hetukattā
anya-e0803n1:98_4: hi suddhakattusaṅkhāte kārake tassaṅgabhāvato saṅgahamupagacchati, tathā kammakattā
anya-e0803n1:98_5: kammakārake, bhāvo pana kevalo. So hi gamanapacanalavanādivasenānekavidhopi kriyāsabhāvattā
anya-e0803n1:98_6: bhedarahito kārakantaro. Evaṁ santepi dabbasannissitattā dabbabhedena bhijjati. Tena
anya-e0803n1:98_7: pāvacane bhāvavācakaṁ padaṁ bahuvacanantampi dissati. Ākhyātikapade bhāvakārakavohāro
anya-e0803n1:98_8: niruttinayaṁ nissāya gato, atthato pana bhāvassa kārakatā nupapajjati. So hi na kiñci
anya-e0803n1:98_9: janeti, na ca kriyāya nimittaṁ. Kriyānimittabhāvoyeva hi kārakalakkhaṇaṁ. Iti mukhyato
anya-e0803n1:98_10: vā hetuto vā bhāvassa kārakatā na labbhati. Evaṁ santepi so karaṇamattattā kārakaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:98_11: Tathā hi karaṇaṁ kāro, kriyā, tadeva kārakanti bhāvassa kārakatā daṭṭhabbā. Yasmā
anya-e0803n1:98_12: pana kriyānimittabhāvoyeva kārakalakkhaṇaṁ, tasmā nāmikapade kārakalakkhaṇe bhāvakārakanti
anya-e0803n1:98_14: vohāro kariyati veyyākaraṇehi. Evaṁ niruttinayaṁ nissāya vuttaṁ bhāvakārakañca dve
anya-e0803n1:98_15: ca kammakattukārakānīti kārakattayaṁ bhavati. Taddīpakañcākhyātikapadaṁ tikārakaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:103_0: Idha bhāvakammesu attanopaduppattiṁ keci akkharacintakā avassamicchantīti tesaṁ mativibhāvanatthamamhehi
anya-e0803n1:103_1: bhāvakammānaṁ kriyāpadāni attanopadavasenuddiṭṭhāni ceva niddiṭṭhāni ca. Sabbānipi
anya-e0803n1:103_3: yojetabbāni. Pāḷiādīsu hi tikārakāni kriyāpadāni parassapadattanopadavasena dvidhā
anya-e0803n1:103_4: ṭhitāni. Seyyathidaṁ? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati. Samādhijjhānakusalā, vandanti
anya-e0803n1:103_5: lokanāyakaṁ. Monaṁ vuccati ñāṇaṁ. Atthābhisamayā dhīro, paṇḍitoti pavuccati. Kathaṁ
anya-e0803n1:103_6: paṭipannassa puggalassa rūpaṁ vibhoti vibhaviyyati. So pahīyissati. Paṇḍukambale
anya-e0803n1:103_7: nikkhittaṁ bhāsate tapate. Pūjako labhate pūjaṁ. Puttakāmā thiyo yācaṁ, labhante
anya-e0803n1:103_8: tādisaṁ sutaṁ. Asito tādi vuccate sabrahmā. Aggijādi pubbeva bhūyate. So pahīyethāpi
anya-e0803n1:103_9: no pahīyethāti evaṁ dvidhā ṭhitāni. Atridaṁ pāḷivavatthānaṁ –
anya-e0803n1:110: Padānaṁ niddeso panati antiādīnaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ vacanānamanurūpena yojetabbo. Evaṁ tikārakakriyāpadāni sarūpato vavatthānato niddesato ca veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n1:111: Idāni nopasaggākammikādivasena bhavatissa dhātussa vinicchayaṁ vadāma –
anya-e0803n1:113: Sopasaggā sakammā ca, iti bhūti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0803n1:117: Gahetvā catudhā hoti, iti ñeyyaṁ visesato.
anya-e0803n1:119: Bhūdhātu kārite sante, ekakammā bhavanti hi.
anya-e0803n1:132: Tatra yassa payogamhi, padassa kattunā kriyā;
anya-e0803n1:133: Nipphāditā vinā kammaṁ, na hoti taṁ sakammakaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:134: ‘‘Pacatī’’ti hi vutte tu, yena kenaci jantunā;
anya-e0803n1:135: Odanaṁ vā panaññaṁ vā, kiñci vatthunti ñāyati.
anya-e0803n1:136: Yassa pana payogamhi, kammena rahitā kriyā;
anya-e0803n1:152: Ettha bhavatidhātumhi, nayo eso na labbhati;
anya-e0803n1:154: Ediso ca nayo nāma, pāḷiyaṁ tu na dissati;
anya-e0803n1:157: Kārāpetī’’ti yo pāṭho, niddese taṁ suniddise.
anya-e0803n1:160: Etaṁ nayaṁ vidū ñatvā, yoje pāṭhānurūpato;
anya-e0803n1:163: Sagaṇe sagaṇe tesaṁ, vuttiṁ dīpetumeva ca.
anya-e0803n1:164: ‘‘Asmiṁ gaṇe ayaṁ dhātu, hotī’’ti tehi viññuno;
anya-e0803n1:166: Tathā hi bhāvakammesu, vihito paccayo tu yo;
anya-e0803n1:169: Nānāvidho nayo evaṁ, mayā ettha pakāsito.
anya-e0803n1:171: Te patvākhyātasadde avigatavimatī honti ñāṇīpi tasmā;
anya-e0803n1:173: Yogaṁ tesaṁ payoge paṭutaramatitaṁ patthayāno kareyya.
